text: Approval for the 2.25mm diameter stent size as part of the multi-link 8 coronary stent system.  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name multi-link 8 sv coronary stent system and is indicated for patients with abrupt or threatened abrupt closure with failed interventional therapy of de novo and restenotic native coronary artery lesions (length <=25 mm) with reference vessel diameters of 2.25mm.
